node_labels.Label: N2_5i
node_labels.Comment: Subaortic node counted as ipsilateral (left sided primary tumor)

node_labels.Label: N3_5c
node_labels.Comment: Subaortic node counted as contralateral (right sided primary tumor)

node_labels.Label: N_other
node_labels.Comment: Lymph node involvement from another tumor

node_labels.Label: N_inflammation
node_labels.Comment: lymph nodes that are active but benign

tumor_labels.Label: T1
tumor_labels.Comment: Tumor surrounded by lung or visceral pleura, without invasion, and more proximal than the lobar bronchus

tumor_labels.Label: T2
tumor_labels.Comment: Tumor surrounded by lung or visceral pleura, without invasion, and more proximal than the lobar bronchus

tumor_labels.Label: T2_main_bronchus
tumor_labels.Comment: involves main bronchus and is more than 2 cm distal to the carina;

tumor_labels.Label: T2_obstr_lobe
tumor_labels.Comment: associated with atelectasis or obstructive pneumonitis that extends to the hilar region without involvement of the entire lung

tumor_labels.Label: T3_Inv_chest_wall
tumor_labels.Comment: direct invasion of the chest wall (including the superior sulcus), diaphragm, phrenic nerve, mediastinal pleura, or parietal pericardium

tumor_labels.Label: T3_main_bronchus
tumor_labels.Comment: involvement of the main bronchus <2 cm distal to the carina

tumor_labels.Label: T3_obstr_lung
tumor_labels.Comment: associated atelectasis or obstructive pneumonitis of the entire lung;

tumor_labels.Label: T3_nodule_same_lobe
tumor_labels.Comment: Tumor nodule within the same lobe as that of the primary tumor

tumor_labels.Label: T4_inv_mediastinum
tumor_labels.Comment: invasion of the mediastinum, heart, great vessels, trachea, recurrent laryngeal nerve, esophagus, vertebral body, or carina

tumor_labels.Label: T4_nodule_diff_lobe
tumor_labels.Comment: Separate tumor nodule within an ipsilateral lobe

stage_labels.msg: Based on the segmentations and the report please make the most accurate staging possible
tumorList: Tx: Primary tumor may not be assessed or detected with sputum or bronchial washings and is not visualized at imaging
T0: No evidence of primary tumor
T1: Tumor <=3 cm across its greatest dimension, surrounded by lung or visceral pleura, without invasion, and more proximal than the lobar bronchus
T1a: Tumor <=2 cm across its greatest dimension
T1b: Tumor >2 cm and <=3 cm across its greatest dimension

T2: Tumor >3 cm and <=7 cm or with any of the following features: involves main bronchus and is more than 2 cm distal to the carina; invades visceral pleura; associated with atelectasis or obstructive pneumonitis that extends to the hilar region without involvement of the entire lung
T2a: Tumor >3 cm and <=5 cm across its greatest dimension
T2b: Tumor >5 cm and <=7 cm across its greatest dimension

T3: Tumor >7 cm or any of the following features: direct invasion of the chest wall (including the superior sulcus), diaphragm, phrenic nerve, mediastinal pleura, or parietal pericardium; involvement of the main bronchus <2 cm distal to the carina (without involvement of the carina); associated atelectasis or obstructive pneumonitis of the entire lung; or a tumor nodule within the same lobe as that of the primary tumor

T4: Tumor of any size with invasion of the mediastinum, heart, great vessels, trachea, recurrent laryngeal nerve, esophagus, vertebral body, or carina or a separate tumor nodule within an ipsilateral lobe
metsList: Nx: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed
N0: No regional lymph node metastasis
N1: Metastasis in ipsilateral peribronchial or ipsilateral hilar and intrapulmonary lymph nodes, including direct extension
N2: Metastasis in ipsilateral mediastinal or subcarinal lymph nodes
N3: Metastasis in contralateral mediastinal, contralateral hilar, ipsilateral, contralateral scalene, or supraclavicular lymph nodes
nodeList: Mx: Distant metastasis cannot be assessed
M1a: Separate tumor nodule within a contralateral lobe or tumor with pleural nodules or malignant pleural (or pericardial) effusion
sarcoidosisCheck: Findings could be biased by sarcoidosis

mets_labels.Label: M1a_contralat
mets_labels.Comment: Separate tumor nodule within a contralateral lobe
